ResearchProjectDef.label: Carbon Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create powdered Carbon from burnable materials, a precursor for many spacer materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carbon Nanotube Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain understanding of the process of synthesizing carbon nanotubes from raw carbon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carbon Fiber Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to weave carbon nanotubes into a sturdy fabric-like material.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Carbon Fiber Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how interweave carbon fiber with Kevlar to produce a superior fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carbon Fiber Lamination
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop methods of bonding carbon fiber with plastic materials to create a strong and light structural material.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Diamond Synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to synthesize industrial diamond from carbon fiber using heat and shearing force to produce one of the strongest materials in nature.
